javadoc:
typedef struct _IMAGE_RESOURCE_DIRECTORY {
     DWORD   Characteristics;
     DWORD   TimeDateStamp;
     WORD    MajorVersion;
     WORD    MinorVersion;
     WORD    NumberOfNamedEntries;
     WORD    NumberOfIdEntries;
 };

methods.javadoc:
Theoretically, this field could hold flags for the resource, but appears to always be 0.
@return the flags for the resource
methods.name: getCharacteristics
methods.comment: Theoretically, this field could hold flags for the resource, but appears to always be 0.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the time/date stamp describing the creation time of the resource.
@return the time/date stamp describing the creation time of the resource
methods.name: getTimeDataStamp
methods.comment: Returns the time/date stamp describing the creation time of the resource.

return.comment: the time/date stamp describing the creation time of the resource

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of array elements that use names and that follow this structure.
@return the number of array elements that use names and that follow this structure
methods.name: getNumberOfNamedEntries
methods.comment: Returns the number of array elements that use names and that follow this structure.

return.comment: the number of array elements that use names and that follow this structure

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of array elements that use integer IDs, and which follow this structure.
@return the number of array elements that use integer IDs, and which follow this structure
methods.name: getNumberOfIdEntries
methods.comment: Returns the number of array elements that use integer IDs, and which follow this structure.

return.comment: the number of array elements that use integer IDs, and which follow this structure

methods.name: getMajorVersion
methods.comment:
Theoretically these fields would hold a version number for the resource.
 These field appear to always be set to 0.

methods.name: getMinorVersion
methods.comment:
Theoretically these fields would hold a version number for the resource.
 These field appear to always be set to 0.

name: ResourceDirectory
